mapper.sql: a.dbid AS "dbid", a.dealcode AS "dealcode", a.dunningpeopleid AS "dunningpeopleid", a.dunningpeoplename AS "dunningpeoplename", a.dunningcycle AS "dunningcycle", a.behaviorstatus AS "behaviorstatus", a.dealcodestatus AS "dealcodestatus", a.payofftime AS "payofftime", a.days AS "days", a.realname AS "realname", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.repaymenttime AS "repaymenttime", a.overduedays AS "overduedays", a.corpusamount AS "corpusamount", a.costamout AS "costamout", a.creditamount AS "creditamount", a.overdueamount AS "overdueamount", a.modifyamount AS "modifyamount", a.delayamount AS "delayamount", a.createby AS "createby", a.createdate AS "createdate", a.updateby AS "updateby", a.updatedate AS "updatedate", a.delaydays AS "delaydays"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_mis_dunning_task_log( dealcode, dunningpeopleid, dunningpeoplename, dunningcycle, behaviorstatus, dealcodestatus, payofftime, days, realname, mobile, repaymenttime, overduedays, corpusamount, costamout, creditamount, overdueamount, modifyamount, delayamount, createby, createdate,
taskid, delaydays ) VALUES ( #{dealcode}, #{dunningpeopleid}, #{dunningpeoplename}, #{dunningcycle}, #{behaviorstatus}, #{dealcodestatus}, #{payofftime}, #{days}, #{realname}, #{mobile}, #{repaymenttime}, #{overduedays}, #{corpusamount}, #{costamout}, #{creditamount}, #{overdueamount}, #{modifyamount}, #{delayamount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate},
#{taskid}, #{delaydays} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_mis_dunning_task_log SET dealcode = #{dealcode}, dunningpeopleid = #{dunningpeopleid}, dunningpeoplename = #{dunningpeoplename}, dunningcycle = #{dunningcycle}, behaviorstatus = #{behaviorstatus}, dealcodestatus = #{dealcodestatus}, payofftime = #{payofftime}, days = #{days}, realname = #{realname}, mobile = #{mobile}, repaymenttime = #{repaymenttime}, overduedays = #{overduedays}, corpusamount = #{corpusamount}, costamout = #{costamout}, creditamount = #{creditamount}, overdueamount = #{overdueamount}, modifyamount = #{modifyamount}, delayamount = #{delayamount}, createby = #{createby}, createdate = #{createdate}, updateby = #{updateby}, updatedate = #{updatedate}, delaydays = #{delaydays} WHERE id = #{id}
